param.value: [VIEW_TOPICS, MOVE_TOPICS, CLOSE_TOPICS, CREATE_POSTS, DELETE_OWN_POSTS, DELETE_OTHERS_POSTS, EDIT_OWN_POSTS, EDIT_OTHERS_POSTS, CREATE_ANNOUNCEMENTS, CREATE_STICKED_TOPICS, CREATE_CODE_REVIEW, LEAVE_COMMENTS_IN_CODE_REVIEW, ADMIN, READ, WRITE, SEND_PRIVATE_MESSAGES, CREATE_FORUM_FAQ, EDIT_OWN_PROFILE, EDIT_OTHERS_PROFILE, CREATE_QUESTIONS]
